text: The Royal Dutch Billiards Federation (KNBB) was founded in 1911 to coordinate, within the Netherlands, billiards, pool and snooker. The union is affiliated with the Union Mondiale de Billard , Confédération Européenne de Billard and NOC * NSF . The Head Office is located in the Blokhoeve district of Nieuwegein == External links == * Official website (in Dutch) Category:Cue sports governing bodies Category:Cue sports in the Netherlands
title: Royal Dutch Billiards Federation
